author: Twilight Games Studio
title: .hack//ez-i
description: Kite, a beginner in 'The World', is playing with his real-life friend Orca when they are attacked by a monster chasing a secretive girl, Aura. Orca's death from the monster's attack puts him in a coma and now Kite must find Aura and bring his friend back!
long_description: Kite, a beginner in the game The World, is playing with his real-life friend known in-game as Orca when they are attacked by an unidentified monster chasing Aura, a secretive girl. Afterwards, Orca, who died from the monsters attack, enters a coma in the real world. Unable to understand the reason for Orcas coma, Kite joins two new characters to find Aura and bring his friend back.
